title: Open Channel Management - Channel
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic Channel made for Raw-Water (Open Channels) System Management domain.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

downstreamNode.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the ID of the downstream node (e.g., Junction, Regulation Structure), where the channel ends.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

upstreamNode.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the ID of the upstream node (e.g., Junction, Regulation Structure), where the channel begins.

geometryType.description: Property. The geometry of the channel. Enum:'Trapezoidal, Circular'].

bottomSlope.description: Property. The bottom slope of the channel. All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

leftSideSlope.description: Property. The slope of the left bank of the channel (for 'Trapezoidal' geometry). All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

rightSideSlope.description: Property. The slope of the right bank of the channel (for 'Trapezoidal' geometry). All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

bottomWidth.description: Property. The bottom width of the channel (for 'Trapezoidal' geometry). All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

diameter.description: Property. The diameter of a circular channel. All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

maxWaterDepth.description: Property. The maximum allowable water depth in the channel. All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

flowType.description: Property. Text defining the type of flow in the channel. Enum:'Free-Surface flow'.

celerity.description: Property. Velocity of a surge propagated along the channel after the opening or close of a sluice gate.

travelDuration.description: Property. The duration of the surge travelling from the downstream node (i.e., Regulation Structure) to the upstream node.

waterLoss.description: Property. Water leakages/losses from the channel - percentage of flow of the channel or a number (flow).

length.description: Property. The length of the channel. All units are accepted in CEFACT code.
